entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 10:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
